title: 'Desired Effect' Reveals How Important Family Is To Rocker Brandon Flowers
teaser: Brandon Flowers is the frontman for the band the Killers, and he makes his own music in between albums his group puts out. David Greene talks to Flowers about his new solo album: "The Desired Effect."
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
